document_data.mainbody:
torbek Ironfoot was an eager dwarvish armorer for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Storbek made a name for himself as a diligent worker, content with any task he was hired to complete. What he lacked in talent, was easily overshadowed by his desire to work. He made a living by selling his armorers services to the adventurers and defenders of Neverwinter.
